name: Playtowin
description:
This is a simple "Tower Defense Game" for "Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2" competition.

This game was made in a team containing: "Excess1972" and "Clarens"

You can move around with WASD, build towers with left mouse button or cancel them with right mouse button. Your goal is to survive as long as you can.
The cost of one tower is 100 gold.

Asset credits:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/upi-e-menu-radial-menu-free-1656...
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/tower-defense-template-107692
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/meshtint-free-polygonal-metalon-151383
